author: Predeactor
MAX
description: Get lyrics from songs you search for.
short: Get lyrics from a song you search for.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing, this cog was orginally from Predeactor and will be continued by me.
This cog require an API key from KSoft.SI, to add one, go to https://api.ksoft.si and add your bot, wait for obtaining your token and register it by using `[p]set api ksoftsi api_key <Your API key>`.
You need to use the v1 token, not v2.
